subtitle: A deliciously healthy and exotic salad.

method.text: Peel and remove the stone from the mango. Cut the flesh into 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>4</sub> cm cubes. Set aside.
Put nearly all the mustard seeds into a clean and dry coffee grinder or spice grinder. Grind until smooth.
Place the yogurt in a bowl. Beat until smooth and creamy. Stir in the ground mustard seeds, green chilli, sugar and salt. Add the mango and stir until well mixed.

Heat the oil in a small frying pan. Add the reserved mustard seed. After a few seconds or as soon as they begin to pop, add the dried chilli. When this starts to darken, add the shallot and cook for 1-2 min or until lightly browned.
Stir the mustard, chilli and shallot mixture into the mango. Serve immediately.

title: Mango salad
